About Me

Hi! I’m Charlie Dixon, a 2D/3D Motion Artist with over 12 years of industry experience. I specialise in After Effects but I'm also comfortable in Cinema 4D w/Redshift. Over the years, I’ve worked in both small, agile teams and large-scale productions, adapting to different workflows and creative challenges. I spent five years at THG Studios, where I led the Post-Production team as Director of Post-Production.
This website may be simple for now, but I built it from scratch using HTML and Tailwind CSS - a project that lets me learn and experiment as I go. Stay tuned for more content and animations as I continue to learn.
Let’s create something great together. Get in touch!
